text: Ricardo Luis Lorenzetti (born 19 September 1955) is a member of the Supreme Court of Justice of Argentina. He was elected President of the high court by his peers on November 7, 2006. Lorenzetti was born in Rafaela, Santa Fe Province. He is the son of a primary school teacher and a travelling salesman.Clarín, 12 June 2005. Lorenzetti: "Sería bueno para Kirchner no nombrar más jueces en la Corte" . He went to school at the National University of the Littoral. He became a lawyer in 1978. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:People from Santa Fe Province Category:Argentine judges
title: Ricardo Lorenzetti
